data.fullContent: Metadata refers to data about data. Metadata helps to label, organize, and search data. It is used in databases, computer software, reports, documents, and other information-oriented items. Metadata helps to organize and categorize the information in the data to help with searching and referencing. Metadata may include properties about who created the data, its source, and usage restrictions. For instance, a school may include information about a lecturer's name and contact information, the name of the lecture series, the dates and times of the lectures, the type of medium that will be used to present the lecture (tape or CD), and other details.

q1.translation: 元数据是关于数据的数据。元数据有助于标记、组织和搜索数据。它被用于数据库、计算机软件、报告、文档和其他面向信息的项目。元数据有助于组织和分类数据中的信息，以帮助搜索和引用。
q1.front: Metadata refers to data about data. Metadata helps to label, organize, and search data. It is used in databases, computer software, reports, documents, and other information-oriented items. Metadata helps to organize and categorize the information in the data to help with searching and referencing.
q1.content: Metadata ____ to data about data. Metadata helps to label, organize, and search ____. It is ____ in databases, computer software, reports, documents, and other information-oriented items. Metadata helps to organize and categorize the ____ in the data to ____ with searching and referencing.

q2.translation: 元数据是关于数据的数据。元数据有助于标记、组织和搜索数据。它被用于数据库、计算机软件、报告、文档和其他面向信息的项目。元数据有助于组织和分类数据中的信息，以帮助搜索和引用。元数据可能包括关于谁创建了数据、数据来源和使用限制的属性。例如，学校可能包括讲师的姓名和联系方式、系列讲座的名称、讲座的日期和时间、将用于演示讲座的媒介类型(磁带或CD)以及其他详细信息。
q2.front: Metadata refers to data about data. Metadata helps to label, organize, and search data. It is used in databases, computer software, reports, documents, and other information-oriented items. Metadata helps to organize and categorize the information in the data to help with searching and referencing.
q2.middle: Metadata may include properties about who created the data, its source, and usage restrictions.
q2.ending: For instance, a school may include information about a lecturer's name and contact information, the name of the lecture series, the dates and times of the lectures, the type of medium that will be used to present the lecture (tape or CD), and other details.

options.sentence: But storing information in our brains via long-term memory requires information processing.
Information science principles are also applied to other fields in the social sciences.
Metadata may include properties about who created the data, its source, and usage restrictions.
Information scientists help businesses and governments make decisions based on available data.

q3.questionContent: What is the main purpose of metadata?
q3.selectAnswer: Metadata helps to label, organize, and search data

options.sentence: Data mining is the search for anomalies and correlations within large data sets.
Classification uses machine learning and pattern recognition to identify and classify objects and relationships.
Clustering, also known as social network analysis, studies groupings of objects based on common characteristics.
Metadata helps to organize and label other data using information about the data.
